content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Adventures Of Michael Shayne with his story, The Murder Trial Of Jack Holmes. This episode originally aired May 21, 1945.

(29:40) Our second story is Death On The Diamond, the September 17, 1945, episode of Bulldog Drummond.
